product_name: Sperry Top-Sider Breton Striped Angelfish Boat Shoes - Women's
long_description: Casual shoes with a laid-back attitude, the Sperry Top-Sider Breton Striped Angelfish Boat Shoes offer comfort when touring sun-drenched ports of call, weekend destionations or everyday locales. Premium nubuck and lightweight mesh uppers and hand-sewn construction with padded tongues promote comfort and lasting wear. EVA molded midsoles provide support and comfort. Adjustable 360deg lacing system ensures a secure fit. Wave-Siping(TM) delivers excellent traction whether it's wet or dry thanks to their nonmarking rubber outsoles. Sperry Top-Sider Breton Striped Angelfish Boat Shoes are stain- and water-resistant.
short_description: Casual shoes with a laid-back attitude, the Sperry Top-Sider Breton Striped Angelfish Boat Shoes offer comfort when touring sun-drenched ports of call, weekend destionations or everyday locales.
